product_name: Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket offers waterproof, breathable protection to help keep you dry and comfortable when dark clouds let loose in the backcountry. MemBrain(R) 2-layer waterproof, breathable laminated fabric fends off snow, wind and rain while reducing internal condensation, so you stay dry, warm and comfortable. Mesh and taffeta linings are placed appropriately to best facilitate wicking, breathability and a comfortable fit. All seams on the Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket are taped for complete protection. Double stormflap with rip-and-stick snap closures and a drawcord hem. Handwarmer pockets. Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket for men has a regular cut. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Marmot Storm Shield Rain Jacket offers waterproof, breathable protection to help keep you dry and comfortable when dark clouds let loose in the backcountry.
